name: HungryJumpingGiraffe
description:
In this game You are playing a giraffe in a construction site. climb up the building to reach the last tree of the area. However this giraffe can only move by swinging her neck to jump around. We worked as a group of three in this prototype:

-Pierre-Alexandre Bartel -> (Pierre-alexandre.bartel@e-artsup.net)

 -Victor Seguin -> (victor.seguin@e-artsup.net)
